get-all-contacts.summary: Get all contacts from the database

listItems.heading: sort
listItems.description: It accepts the comma separated attribute names for sorting the results. By default, sorting is done in ascending order. For sorting in desceding order we need to add - (hyphen) before attribute name.

listItems.heading: page
listItems.description: It accepts the page number for pagination. By default, it is 1.

listItems.heading: limit
listItems.description: It accepts the number of records to be returned per page. By default, it is 10.

listItems.heading: Bearer Token
listItems.description: It is the token generated by the system for the user.

listItems.heading: status
listItems.description: It indicates whether the request was success or faild.

listItems.heading: ok
listItems.description: True indicates the response has no errors.

listItems.heading: results
listItems.description: It indicates the number of records returned.

listItems.heading: data
listItems.description: It contains the array of objects of contacts.

get-contact-by-ID.summary: Get the contact with contact id from database

listItems.heading: id
listItems.description: It is the id of the contact.

listItems.heading: Bearer Token
listItems.description: It is the token generated by the system for the user.

get-contact-by-username.summary: Get the contact with contact LinkedIn username from database

listItems.heading: username
listItems.description: It is the Linkedin username of the contact.

listItems.heading: Bearer Token
listItems.description: It is the token generated by the system for the user.

add-new-contact.summary: Add a new contact to the database

listItems.heading: name
listItems.description: It is the name of the contact.

listItems.heading: linkedinURL
listItems.description: It is the linkedin url of the contact.

listItems.heading: email
listItems.description: It is the array of email ids of the contact.

listItems.heading: mobileNumber
listItems.description: It is the array of mobile numbers of the contact.

listItems.heading: faxNumber
listItems.description: It is the array of fax numbers of the contact.

listItems.heading: telNumber
listItems.description: It is the array of telephone numbers of the contact.

listItems.heading: address
listItems.description: It is the address of the contact.

listItems.heading: Bearer Token
listItems.description: It is the token generated by the system for the user.
